description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the SAP Business Network posting response closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. Unless specified otherwise in the tender opportunity, all required supporting documentation and responses must be submitted by the response deadline time of 1400 ET . All responses submitted after 1400 ET will result in the submission being declared non-responsive. Work under this Standing Offer shall comprise the supply of General Contractor Services as requested by Correction Services of Canada for construction, alterations, and repair work, at the following institutions: Bowden Institution in Innisfail, AB, and Púa Súa.Areas in Maskwacis, AB.  Services are to be provided on anoví ‘as required’asis.’ basis in the form of call-ups for various General Contractor Services. It is anticipated that only 1 firm will be issued a standing offer. The standing offer will be issued for a term of three years.
duration_in_months: The Standing Offer will be issued for a term of three years as per the standard terms and conditions defined by this tender notice
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement

## Title
### English: 21537-241258 General Contractor Services
### French: 21537-241258 Services d'entrepreneur général

## Reference Number
21537-241258

## Tender Details
- **Solicitation Number**: WS4510568260
- **Publication Date**: May 13, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: June 5, 2024, at 14:00:00 ET
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
- **Expected Contract End Date**: May 31, 2027

## Tender Status
This tender has expired.

## Area of Application
The services required are for General Contractor Services as requested by Correctional Service of Canada for construction, alteration, and repair work at the following institutions:
- Bowden Institution, 1250AL, Centre 8, Building HS-41 Birdtail, Bowden AB T0M 0M0
- Pê Sâkâstêw Centre, 254 Range Road 274, Maskwacis AB T0C 2B9

## Standing Offer Notice
The Standing Offer is being issued for a three-year term. The contractor will supply the necessary workforce, tools, equipment, and materials to perform the required services.

## Procurement Details
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Procurement Category**: CNST
- **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

## Contracting Entity
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

## Contact Information
- **Ben Wong (SPAC/PSPC)**, (ben.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Attachment
Please be aware that there are no documents attached to this tender announcement. Interested parties need to visit the Ariba Discovery portal for the entire list of required documents. [Please see Ariba Discovery link for the tender notice.]
